name: AdditionalInterestRole
title: Additional Interest Role
description: Roles of additional interested parties who have a financial or contractual interest in a policy.

concept.definition: A lender holding a mortgage on real property who is entitled to notice of cancellation and claim payments for property damage.
A party entitled to receive claim payments for loss or damage to personal property in which they hold a financial interest.
A party added to the policy as an insured, typically by endorsement, receiving coverage under the policy's liability section.
A party who receives a certificate of coverage as evidence that a policy is in force, but who may not have coverage rights.
A party holding a security interest in personal property (e.g., a vehicle lender) entitled to notice and claim payments.
The owner of leased property who retains a financial interest in the asset.
A fiduciary holding property in trust who has an interest in maintaining coverage on the trust assets.
